title: Anatoly Morozov (athlete)
text:
Anatoly Nikolaevich Morozov (; born 23 October 1973) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> coach and a former player. He is an assistant coach with <a href="FC%20Chernomorets%20Novorossiysk">FC Chernomorets Novorossiysk</a>.
International.
In 2003, he was granted Armenian citizenship in order to qualify as a <a href="defender%20%28football%29">defender</a> for the <a href="Armenia%20national%20football%20team">national team</a>. He received his first call-up in August 2003 <a href="http%3A//soccernet.espn.go.com/news/story%3Fid%3D275283%26amp%3Bcc%3D5739"></a>. However, he has not actually gained any caps for Armenia.
